Key Match Events: Tomáš Chorý received a straight red card early in the match.
Antonín Barák was sent off with two yellow cards early in the match.
Arda Güler missed a clear chance to score for Turkey.
Tomáš Souček equalized for the Czech Republic with a goal in the 66th minute.
Hakan Çalhanoğlu scored a goal for Turkey in the 51st minute.
Cenk Tosun scored the winning goal for Turkey in the 90+4 minute.
Miscellaneous Highlights: A brawl broke out shortly after the match started, leading to multiple bookings.
The referee gave a lot of yellow cards, with several players receiving them.
Turkey qualified for the Round of 16, while the Czech Republic was eliminated.
The match was intense and dramatic, despite the low quality of play.
